org.apache.struts.taglib
Class BaseInputTag

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
        |
        +--javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
              |
              +--org.apache.struts.taglib.BaseHandlerTag
                    |
                    +--org.apache.struts.taglib.BaseInputTag
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseFieldTag, PropertyTag, TextareaTag
public abstract class BaseInputTag
extends BaseHandlerTag

Abstract base class for the various input tags.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $ $Date: 2000/07/17 16:37:45 $
Author:
Craig R. McClanahan
See Also:
